Innovation, Energy

paragrah-1.title: Why the world is paying attention to rechargeable batteries
paragrah-1.text:
GRINERGY's POTERE battery is GRINERGY innovation that creates value through its
high efficiency and high performance. POTERE battery opens a new paradigm of
the secondary battery market with GRINERGY’s innovation and advanced technologies
We seek to advance green innovation for humanity, the environment, and the future
to become a leader in the secondary battery market.

Why the world is paying attention to

paragrah-2.title: More than a battery, a green value
paragrah-2.text:
GRINERGY pursues innovation for people and the environment. We lead the global
future energy era with GRINERGY inventive green innovation differentiated
from other technologies.
paragrah-2.mobile-title: More than a battery, a green value
paragrah-2.mobile-text:
GRINERGY pursues innovation
for people and the environment.
We lead the global future energy
era with GRINERGY inventive green
innovation differentiated from
other technologies.

paragrah-3.title: GRINERGY’s mission
paragrah-3.text:
GRINERGY advances the future by innovating energy for the environment, future,
and people. We are ready to lead the secondary battery market with the new
innovative POTERE battery. Recognized for its excellence, the POTERE battery will
overcome the problems of existing secondary batteries and advance into various
battery markets to take the lead as a leader in the battery market.
paragrah-3.mobile-text:
GRINERGY advances the future
by innovating energy for the
environment, future, and people.
We are ready to lead the secondary
battery market with the new innovative
POTERE battery. Recognized for its
excellence, the POTERE battery will
overcome the problems of existing
secondary batteries and advance into
various battery markets to take the
lead as a leader in the battery market.

paragrah-4.title: GRINERGY’s vision
paragrah-4.text:
GRINERGY vigorously leaps toward eco-friendly, sustainable, safe, and innovative
future energy. GRINERGY has entered the $45 billion battery market
and with this movement as a foundation. GRINERGY will open the next generation
of battery technology. GRINERGY promotes mass production of products by signing
contracts to supply POTERE batteries for light-emitting signs, RVs & campers,
and smart robots. Furthermore, we plan to enter the battery market used in ESS,
trains, vehicles, and military equipment.
paragrah-4.mobile-text:
GRINERGY vigorously leaps toward
eco-friendly, sustainable, safe, and
innovative future energy. GRINERGY

Furthermore, we plan to enter the
battery market used in ESS, trains,
vehicles, and military equipment.

paragrah-5.title: GRINERGY logo
paragrah-5.text:
GRINERGY's logo was designed by combining the shapes of GREEN's 'GR', INNOVATION's 'IN',
and ENERGY's 'ERGY'. GRINERGY pursues sustainable energy by symbolically expressing infinity
with the initial of the logo 'G'.
paragrah-5.mobile-text:
GRINERGY's logo was designed
by combining the shapes of GREEN's
'GR', INNOVATION's 'IN',
and ENERGY's 'ERGY'. GRINERGY
pursues sustainable energy
by symbolically expressing infinity
with the initial of the logo 'G'.

paragrah-6.title: GRINERGY’s mascot 'GREENY'
paragrah-6.text:
GREENY, which loves people and the environment, is a symbol of GRINERGY with a bright smile.
It is a character with a strong sense of justice that helps people's convenience
with excellent power embodying a battery as a motif.
paragrah-6.mobile-text:
GREENY, which loves people and
the environment, is a symbol of
GRINERGY with a bright smile.
It is a character with a strong sense
of justice that helps people's
convenience with excellent power
embodying a battery as a motif.

paragrah-1.title: POTERE, overcome the limitation of current lithium battery
paragrah-1.text:
The POTERE battery has greatly improved performance and stability compared to existing
lithium batteries through GRINERGY’s technology and solved the environmental pollution
problem of lead-acid batteries.

POTERE, overcome the limitation
of current lithium battery
paragrah-1.mobile-text:
The POTERE battery has greatly
improved performance and stability
compared to existing lithium batteries
through GRINERGY’s technology and
solved the environmental pollution
problem of lead-acid batteries.

paragrah-2.title: The reason why GRINERGY is in the spotlight
paragrah-2.text: GRINERGY’s 4 core technologies are attracting worldwide attention.
paragrah-2.mobile-title:
The reason why
GRINERGY is in the spotlight
paragrah-2.mobile-text:
GRINERGY’s 4 core technologies are
attracting worldwide attention.

paragrah-3.title: GRINERGY product line
paragrah-3.text:
GRINERGY is a company specializing in lithium-ion rechargeable batteries.
Stability, low-temperature performance, extended lifespan,and fast charging
ability are the key consideration of GRINERGY.
paragrah-3.mobile-text:
GRINERGY is a company specializing
in lithium-ion rechargeable batteries.
Stability, low-temperature performance,
extended lifespan, and fast charging
ability are the key consideration
of GRINERGY.

Advantages
of secondary battery
LTO technology

info.title:
Advantages of
secondary battery LTO technology

item1.text:
GRINERGY’s POTERE battery procured stability which
is the most important factor of a battery. Unlike other
lithium-ion batteries that are exposed to explosion and
fire hazards, POTERE battery does not have the risk of
explosion under 400°c or higher temperature.
item1.mobile-text: GRINERGY’s POTERE battery procured stability which is the most important factor of a battery. Unlike other lithium-ion batteries that are exposed to explosion and fire hazards, POTERE battery does not have the risk of explosion under 400°c or higher temperature.

item2.text:
Explosive fast charging performance is a key
essential factor of a battery.
POTERE battery’s fast charging performance is 10c
which performs three times higher charging speed
compared to other lithium polymer batteries.
item2.mobile-text: Explosive fast charging performance is a key essential factor of a battery. POTERE battery’s fast charging performance is 10c which performs three times higher charging speed compared to other lithium polymer batteries.

item3.text:
POTERE battery has outstanding charging
performance which is 10 times faster compared
to other lithium polymer batteries. Furthermore,
the POTERE battery can be charged under
any circumstances. POTERE battery provides
outstanding charging performance even at a low
temperature of -35°c.
item3.mobile-text: POTERE battery has outstanding charging performance which is 10 times faster compared to other lithium polymer batteries. Furthermore, the POTERE battery can be charged under any circumstances. POTERE battery provides outstanding charging performance even at a low temperature of -35°c.

item4.text:
No matter how outstanding the performance is,
lifespan is an essential factor to consider.
POTERE battery backs up its outstanding
performance and efficiency through its extended
lifespan of 5-7x.
item4.mobile-text: No matter how outstanding the performance is, lifespan is an essential factor to consider. POTERE battery backs up its outstanding performance and efficiency through its extended lifespan of 5-7x.
